levels.description:
Applies the Nightmare effect to up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies within range:
Decreases the Movement Speed of affected enemies by <@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</> for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds, and makes them suffer <@ba.vup>True</> damage proportional to the distance they move during this effect
